"Xiera": "The Photon Particle Cannon Carrier is on the move!"
"This weapon is powered by Mana. If it runs out of Mana, the operation will be a failure. It'll lose Mana if it gets attacked, so keep your eyes on it."
"Also, we had to put this together in a hurry, so it loses Mana just by moving."
"Pay attention to its remaining Mana, and keep it charged up by collecting the Mana Crystals you'll find nearby."
